vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βαρθολομαῖος, -ου, ὁ (Aram. בַּר־תָּלְמַי, son of Tolmai),
Bartholomew, the Apostle (see: Ναθαναήλ): Mat.10:3, Mrk.3:18, Luk.6:14, Act.1:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.10.3
§ Bartholomew, "son of Talmai"
Bartholomew, (Proper name)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴多羅買 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在亞蘭文的意思是 "多羅買的兒子"
耶穌的十二使徒之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴多罗买 这个阳性专有名词 人名在亚兰文的意思是 "多罗买的儿子"
耶稣的十二使徒之一
